entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or freezing drizzle. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm except 15 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 6:12 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm except 30 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:12 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 6:12 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
